publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1631 Mr Brian Monteith: Increased Water Charges—That the Parliament notes with concern the huge increases in charges for water and sewerage services announced by East of Scotland Water Authority which will particularly hit those on fixed incomes such as pensioners and further notes that Scots are already paying an extra £154 million each year for these services compared to 1997.

S1M-1631 Mr Brian Monteith: Increased Water Charges—That the Parliament notes with concern the huge increases in charges for water and sewerage services announced by East of Scotland Water Authority which will particularly hit those on fixed incomes such as pensioners and further notes that Scots are already paying an extra £154 million each year for these services compared to 1997.

S1M-1631 Increased Water Charges (lodged on 5 February 2001) Mr Keith Harding*

S1M-1631 Mr Brian Monteith: Increased Water Charges—That the Parliament notes with concern the huge increases in charges for water and sewerage services announced by East of Scotland Water Authority which will particularly hit those on fixed incomes such as pensioners and further notes that Scots are already paying an extra £154 million each year for these services compared to 1997. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding
